Major_Arcs.title: Setting the Scene and Initial Conflicts in Ghost Town
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the setting of a Ghost Town saloon and establishes initial conflicts and character dynamics through conversations and atmosphere.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Scene Introduction
sub_scenes.description: The narrative begins by setting the scene in a saloon, establishing the atmosphere and introducing the environment of the Ghost Town.

narrative_arcs.title: Saloon Scene Setting

sub_scenes.title: Blonde Woman's Explanation and Man's Frustration
sub_scenes.description: This scene focuses on a conversation between a blonde woman and a man, highlighting their contrasting perspectives and introducing 'Old Timers' wisdom.

narrative_arcs.title: The Blonde Woman's Explanation
Conversation Continues - Man's Response and Old Timers' Wisdom

Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town Demolition and Emotional Reactions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the focus to the impending demolition of the Ghost Town and the various emotional responses from different characters.

sub_scenes.title: Cowboy's Nostalgia and Surveyors' Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces a cowboy reflecting on the past glory of the Ghost Town and contrasts it with the arrival of modern surveyors.

narrative_arcs.title: Cowboy's Farewell and Nostalgic Reflection
Modern Arrival and Ghost Town Observation

sub_scenes.title: Imminent Demolition and Emotional Distress
sub_scenes.description: This scene reveals the surveyors' plan to demolish the Ghost Town and highlights the emotional reaction of one surveyor woman to this news.

narrative_arcs.title: Airport Plan and Town Demolition Imminent
Emotional Reaction to Ghost Town's Destruction

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Conflict and Ghost Town Protest
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the personal relationship conflict between Nan and Cal, intertwined with the emotional protest against the Ghost Town's demolition.

sub_scenes.title: Nan and Cal's Argument
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts a heated argument between Nan and Cal regarding their relationship and romantic expectations.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Accusation and Cal's Defense
Woman's Reflection on Past Relationship with Cal

sub_scenes.title: Woman's Outburst Against Demolition
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows the woman's emotional outburst against the demolition workers, highlighting her strong emotional connection to the Ghost Town.

narrative_arcs.title: Ghost Town Demolition and Woman's Outburst

Major_Arcs.title: Business Matters and Father-Daughter Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to business discussions related to cattle and the airport, leading to a conflict between Nan and her father.

sub_scenes.title: Cattle Shipping and Airport Business Talk
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces a business discussion about cattle shipping logistics and the airport project.

narrative_arcs.title: Cattle Shipping and Airport Business Discussion

sub_scenes.title: Horses for Construction and Father-Daughter Argument
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts a conflict between Nan and her father over providing horses for the construction workers, escalating into an emotional argument.

narrative_arcs.title: Horses for Construction and Father-Daughter Conflict

Major_Arcs.title: Reassurance and Nan's Resolve Regarding Cal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Nan's emotional state after the conflict with her father and her journey towards seeking clarity about her relationship with Cal.

sub_scenes.title: Parental and Maid's Reassurance of Cal's Love
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows Nan being comforted and reassured by her mother, father, and maid about Cal's love for her.

narrative_arcs.title: Reassurance of Cal's Love

sub_scenes.title: Nan's Decision to Seek Clarity from Cal
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Nan's internal resolve to seek direct confirmation from Cal about his intentions.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Resolve to Seek Clarity
Chasing Cal
Horse Business Interruption
Business Deal and Commitment

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation and Departure of Cal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the intense conversation between Nan and Cal, leading to Cal's frustrated departure and Nan's reaction.

sub_scenes.title: Heated Conversation and Implied Departure
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows a heated discussion between Nan and Cal, where Cal expresses frustration and hints at leaving.

narrative_arcs.title: Intense Conversation and Impending Departure
Cal's Departure
Reaction to Departing Horses

sub_scenes.title: Time Skip, Longing, and Cal's Return
sub_scenes.description: This scene includes a time skip and narration detailing Nan's longing for Cal, followed by Cal's unexpected return and confession.

narrative_arcs.title: Time Skip and Nan's Longing Narration
Cal's Return and Confession of Love

Major_Arcs.title: Reunion, Snowstorm, and Cattle Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the reunion of Nan and Cal amidst a severe snowstorm and the escalating crisis concerning the livestock.

sub_scenes.title: Snowy Reunion and Unease
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows Nan and Cal's reunion in a snowy setting, marked by a subtle unease despite the romantic reconciliation.

narrative_arcs.title: Reunion and Unease in the Snow

sub_scenes.title: Weather Report and Livestock Concern
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces the severe weather conditions and the growing concern for the livestock due to heavy snowfall.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Snowy Homestead and Weather Report
Concern Over Livestock and Fodder Shortage
Assessing the Snow's Severity and Nan's Concern
Narrative Description of Relentless Snowfall
Cal's Decisive Action to Save the Cattle

Major_Arcs.title: Fodder Delivery and Romantic Reaffirmation Amidst Crisis
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shows the arrival of fodder by plane, bringing relief from the snowstorm crisis, and culminates in a romantic reaffirmation between Nan and Cal.

sub_scenes.title: Despair and Hope with Plane's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts the despair caused by the snowstorm and the sudden hope brought by the sound of a plane.

narrative_arcs.title: Indoor Despair and a Glimmer of Hope
Plane Arrives with Fodder
Hope and Romantic Reassurance

Major_Arcs.title: Showdown in Cowtown and Jeff's Gun Obsession
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new location, Cowtown, and introduces Chane Benson in a showdown, along with the developing subplot of Jeff's gun obsession and Sally's concern.

sub_scenes.title: Showdown and Public Reaction in Cowtown
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts a showdown in Cowtown involving Chane Benson and the diverse reactions of onlookers.

narrative_arcs.title: Showdown and Reactions in Cowtown
Debate on Chane Benson's Character
Dismissive Reaction and Age Critique

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Concern over Jeff's Gun Handling
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces Sally's worry about her brother Jeff's unhealthy interest in guns and her attempts to intervene.

Confrontation over Gun Cleaning

Violent Threat and Laughter

Major_Arcs.title: Intervention for Jeff and Introduction of Shane Benson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Sally and Pete's plan to help Jeff and introduces Shane Benson, whose unsettling demeanor raises concerns.

sub_scenes.title: Planning to Help Jeff and Reaffirming Love
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows Sally and Pete discussing how to help Jeff and reaffirming their relationship amidst the concern.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning to Help Jeff
Reaffirming Love and Duty Towards Jeff

Narrative Reflection on Shane Benson's Demeanor

Major_Arcs.title: Article Controversy and Benson's Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around the controversy sparked by an article written by Clyde about Chane Benson, leading to fear and direct confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Fear and Reassurance Regarding the Article
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows the immediate reaction to Clyde's article, with a woman expressing fear and Clyde attempting to reassure her.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation about the Article
Sally's Fear and Clyde's Reassurance
Benson's Confrontation and Justification for Staying

sub_scenes.title: Debate and Dinner Invitation for Benson
sub_scenes.description: This scene involves a debate about Benson's character and leads to Sally suggesting inviting him for dinner to understand him better.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner Disaster and Rescue of Clyde
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the dinner with Chane Benson, which turns into a disaster due to Jeff's jealousy, and the subsequent urgent action to rescue Clyde.

sub_scenes.description: This scene starts with a polite interaction at the dinner but quickly escalates with Jeff's jealous confrontation.

sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts the conversation after the assault, Chane's retaliation, and the urgent ride to town to save Clyde.

sub_scenes.description: This scene shows the confrontation resolving outside the newspaper office, followed by the anxious wait and headline change.

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Troubles and Betsy's Emerging Romance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new setting at a ranch, introducing Betsy and Steve Daley, and focuses on ranch troubles and their developing romance.

sub_scenes.description: This scene starts with a physical confrontation and introduces Steve Daley as the new boss at the ranch.

sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts a confrontation in town and a separate bar fight, illustrating the rough environment.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Realization and Romantic Confession
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows Betsy's realization about Steve's nature and her confession of love, leading to a romantic development.

Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the development of Betsy and Steve's romance alongside escalating ranch conflicts and threats.

sub_scenes.description: This scene shows Betsy and Steve negotiating the terms of their relationship and Steve's identity as a gunfighter.

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Fence Dispute and Brotherly Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new ranch setting and introduces a land dispute over a fence, highlighting the conflict between ranchers and brotherly tensions.

sub_scenes.description: This scene begins with Dave sulking and transitions into a flashback explaining the ranch fence dispute.

Major_Arcs.title: Love Triangle and Proposal Resolution

sub_scenes.description: This scene shows Carrie and Dave discussing their feelings, interrupted by Fred Gordon, leading to a confrontation.

Major_Arcs.title: Business vs. Romance and Carlton Contract
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc highlights the conflict between business priorities and romantic feelings, centered around the Carlton contract and Carrie's reaction.

sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Carrie's decision to leave the West and her distant reunion with Dave in town.
